law.catch_line: Health Access Nurturing Development Services for at-risk parents.

text.section: The cabinet shall administer the HANDS program in cooperation with the Cabinet for Health and Family Services and the local public health departments. The voluntary home visitation program may supplement, but shall not duplicate, any existing program that provides assistance to parents of young children.
The HANDS program shall include an educational component on the recognition and prevention of pediatric abusive head trauma, as defined in KRS 620.020.
Participants in the HANDS program shall express informed consent to participate by written agreement on a form promulgated by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 368, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 12, effective July 14, 2000.
